name: Ext_R5_SampledData_intervalUnit
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.SampledData.intervalUnit for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents SampledData.intervalUnit from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/SampledData|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: The measurement unit of the interval between samples
element.definition: The measurement unit in which the sample interval is expressed.
element.comment: `SampledData.intervalUnit` maps to R4B `SampledData.period`. Has no type mapping `period` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ucum-units|5.0.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: The measurement unit of the interval between samples
element.definition: The measurement unit in which the sample interval is expressed.
element.comment: `SampledData.intervalUnit` maps to R4B `SampledData.period`. Has no type mapping `period` removed the required value set binding to `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/ucum-units|5.0.0`. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Units of measure allowed for an element.
